```{r}

library(ATACseqQC)

```


Usage
```{r}

saturationPlot(subsamplingPeakFiles, subsamplingSizes, sep = "\t",
  header = FALSE, fdr = 0.05, fdrCol = 9, startCol = 2,
  endCol = 3, skipLines = 1, peakCaller = "MACS2", outPrefix,
  span = 2, degree = 2)

```

Specify inputs
```{r}

# Specify subsampling levels
subLevs <- c(
  40498695, # 100 %
  36448434, # 90 %
  20249144, # 50 %
  4049526  # 10 %
  )

subPeakFiles <- c(
  "/home/ubuntu1/atac/snu61/wt01/dp_bam/peaks_macs_m1/test_peaks.narrowPeak",
  "/home/ubuntu1/atac/snu61/wt01/dp_bam/peaks_macs_m1/test90_peaks.narrowPeak",
  "/home/ubuntu1/atac/snu61/wt01/dp_bam/peaks_macs_m1/test50_peaks.narrowPeak",
  "/home/ubuntu1/atac/snu61/wt01/dp_bam/peaks_macs_m1/test10_peaks.narrowPeak"
)


```
